meta.name: Data Toys Dashboard System
meta.author: GPT-5.1 Codex
meta.source: Visual analysis of provided dashboard mock (Data Toys - Vis√£o Geral)
meta.purpose: High-level guidance so AI and designers can recreate the look-and-feel consistently across the product.

principles.name: Playful Minimalism
directives: Combine dark, quiet canvases with a few loud toy-like accents.
Favor large negative space blocks to make the data feel calm and premium.
Use geometric icons and playful bricks sparingly to hint at the toy brand.

principles.name: Contrast With Restraint
directives: Primary contrast comes from neon accents on muted charcoal surfaces.
Cards always float atop deeper panels using subtle inner highlights.
Typography contrast (weight, scale) replaces heavy borders whenever possible.

principles.name: Guided Focus
directives: Guide the eye from the sidebar to hero stats to analytical panels.
Stack KPI chips at the top as the first touchpoint for performance.
Charts and tables inherit a consistent hierarchy: title, filters, content.

layout.canvas: Desktop-first dashboard framed within a 1440px wide safe area centered inside a light gray stage.
layout.grid: 12-column grid with 72px gutters for macro layout; inner card grids use 4px increments on an 8px base.

spacing_scale.usage: Outer shell padding 32px; card inset padding 20-24px; icon-only buttons 48px squares.

radii.usage: All surfaces feature soft, pill-like corners; sidebar buttons are fully rounded for icon focus.

lavender_core.usage: Brand hero accent, tab primary, playful bricks

rules: Only one neon accent per card to avoid noise.
Use mist text on graphite panels, smoke text for captions.
Apply subtle inner stroke (#FFFFFF0D) to accent cards for glow.
Use uppercase labels only in sidebar and tab tags.
Mix font weights instead of font sizes for emphasis inside cards.
All text is anti-aliased on dark backgrounds to maintain fidelity.

iconography.style: Rounded geometric icons with consistent stroke width (2px or filled).
treatments: Icons are always centered within 48x48 chips.
Sidebar icons invert color when active, plus a mint indicator pill.

effects.dividers: Use soft 1px lines (#FFFFFF08) only when grouping inside a card.
effects.glows: Accent chips can add a 20px blurred glow of the accent color at 25% opacity.

app_shell.structure: Full-bleed light-gray stage hosting a rounded dark dashboard shell with 24px radius.
sections: Central analytics canvas with stacked cards.
app_shell.spacing: Outer margin 40px from stage; internal gutters 24px.

sidebar_nav.structure: Column with icon buttons, each 56px tall, centered; top houses brand glyph circle.

states.default: Icon in smoke on ink surface.
states.active: Button background graphite_panel, inset mint pill to the left, icon in mint.

sidebar_nav.interactions: Hover lifts button 4px with glow; active tab persists as user scrolls.

content: Brand title 'Data Toys' in display type.
Subtitle with locale language tone in smoke text.
header.adjacent_actions: Right corner hosts floating lego bricks illustration overlapping shell.

variants: Receita (mint accent) with icon medallion left-aligned.
stat_cards.structure: Card height 120px, 20px padding, top tag line, bold metric, small delta text.
stat_cards.interaction: Entire card clickable; focus ring uses accent color at 35% opacity.

tab_switcher.style: Segmented control underlined by accent strokes; active tab uses accent and 2px glow.

shared_rules: Panel titles pinned top-left; optional helper text or dropdown lives opposite.
Content zone uses 16px inner padding with 12px rounded corners.

chart_canvas.surface: #111015 with inset highlight #FFFFFF08 to simulate glass.
chart_canvas.legends: Rounded pills with 8px horizontal padding, 4px vertical.

floating_bricks.description: Decorative lego blocks in cyan and lavender with simple highlights and drop shadows.
floating_bricks.placement: Top-right of hero panel; can appear elsewhere sparingly to add whimsy.
